description: Authorities ramp up restrictions but still have not imposed a full lockdown to curb the coronavirus.
title: Coronavirus: Turkey sets strict measures as cases soar
title_page: Coronavirus: Turkey sets strict measures as cases soar - BBC News
maintext: Since the first case was confirmed - on 11 March - the virus has reached every corner of the country, all 81 provinces. President Erdogan has been trying to contain Covid-19 without shutting down the economy. Doctors, trade unions and the opposition say he has not gone far enough. There are growing calls for a total lockdown.
